about_the_game:
TERMINAL is a relaxing atmospheric narrative puzzle game in which you guide a lost Terminal, Kwisi, to a mysterious signal. Make friends, enemies, and push through hardships and challenges as you make your way to the signal's origin.



In deep slumber, a lost Terminal, Kwisi, is awoken as she receives a mysterious signal with nothing but a location - The Overview. Journey out on an exciting voyage and explore a fascinating world as you make your way to the signal's origin. Sail through oceans, trudge through dingy bars, and make connections you'll never forget.



Kwisi possesses a unique ability to hop into other Terminal networks. To reach The Overview, you will have to guide her by connecting together Terminals. Of many varieties, Terminals, just like people, are their own. Some are willing to guide your way, while others aren't happy with you invading their space. As you progress, you will run into more difficult challenges and more unique Terminals, each with their own quirks and characteristics.

name: TERMINAL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 / Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: TERMINAL is a narrative puzzle adventure in which you guide a lost Terminal, Kwisi, to a mysterious signal. Make friends, enemies, and push through hardships and challenges as you make your way to the signal's origin. Embark on a fascinating journey and make connections you'll never forget.
